Package it.polimi.se2018.model.rules

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    MoveRules
    MoveRules Interface This interface manages the movement rules
    SchemeCardConstraint
    SchemeCardConstraint Interface This interface returns a boolean for a valid constraint
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ChoseConstraint
    ChoseConstraint Class This class is used to apply the placement rules
    ChosePlacementRules
    ChosePlacementRules Class This class is used to verify if a die placement is correct or not
    ColorConstraint
    ColorConstraint Class implements SchemeCardConstraint This class is used to verify the correct color placement of a die
    PlacementColorConstraint
    PlacementColorConstraint Class implements MoveRules This class manage all color restrictions
    PlacementNumberConstraint
    PlacementNumberConstraint Class implements MoveRules This class manage all value restrictions
    PlacementOnlyConstraint
    PlacementOnlyConstraint class implements MoveRules This class manage placement constraints
    Rules
    Rules Class
    TestChoseInputMove
    ChoseInputMove Tester This method verifies the correct functioning of the ChoseInputMove class
    TestColorConstraint
    TestCard Class This class tests the correct application of constraint
    TestPlacementColorConstraint
    TestPlacementColorConstraint Tester Test the efficiency of the application of PlacementColor
    TestPlacementNumberConstraint
    TestPlacementValueConstraint Test the efficiency of the application of PlacementValue
    TestPlacementOnlyConstraint
    TestPlacementOnlyConstraint Tester Test the efficiency of the application of PlacementOnly
    TestValueConstraint
    TestValueConstraint Test the efficiency of the application of ValueConstraint
    ValueConstraint
    ValueConstraint Class implements SchemeCardConstraint This class checks all value constraints
